// Financial assistance for disabled person
Financial Assistance for disabled person Visually impaired, hearing impaired, orthopedically handicapped Special education is provided to disabled children between age group of 6 to 18 years. 1. Applicant should have minimum 40% disability 2. Applicant should be domicile in Maharashtra
1. Free education 2. Free facilities of food, shelter, clothing

//Financial assistance to self-employed for train disabled person Financial assistance to self-employed for train disabled person Visually impaired, hearing impaired, orthopedically handicapped SFacilitate purchase of equipment for those disabled person who are completely trend from government institutes to start their own business 1. Applicant must complete their vocational training in government institution 2. Applicant should have minimum 40% disability 3. Applicant should be domicile in Maharashtra
Provides financial assistance of ₹1000 for purchase of total equipment’s to start their own business

All category disabled person Pension scheme Under the schema ₹600 per month is given to each beneficiary
A disable person in age of 18265 years and having 80% disability is eligible under the schem
a. He or she is entitled to receive ₹200 per month under the scheme. He or she also receive ₹400 per month under state sponsored Sanjay Gandhi niradhar anudan yojna

Our team is dedicated to providing accurate, reliable and efficient solutions to help you navigate the complex financial landscape with ease.
Our system is designed to analyze historical data and apply advanced algorithms to provide accurate predictions on future trends in various schemes. This helps our clients make informed decisions about their investments, and avoid potential losses.
Our team is comprised of experts in the field of finance, data science and software engineering. With years of experience and a deep understanding of the financial markets, our team is dedicated to providing the highest quality service to our clients.
At our core, we are driven by a commitment to excellence and a passion for innovation. We are constantly exploring new technologies and techniques to improve our system and provide the best possible service to our clients.
